name: DEADLINE (itch) (WIITD)
description:
Game created for The Birthday Jam! in less then 2 days

STORY:

You are about to drink another cup of coffee but suddenly you receive message from your boss. He wants to see results of your work. Of course as a good employee you already did your job, all is needed is to send it. Unfortunately your office is at the end this long hallway and everything is in complete chaos because of deadlines.

At least there is music coming from the speakers that tries to improve the atmosphere a bi.

CONTROLS:

* A/D/Arrows -> move left/right

* Space -> stop
